item.title: Moka Notes
item.description: Over the winter, with some prodding from a friend in the neighborhood, I decided to get into making coffee from scratch. And I decided to jump into the deep end with Moka Pot (sometimes known as a “stove-top espresso maker”). Coffee brewing with a Moka pot. Moka pots are more popular in Europe, but can be found all over the world; they’ve been around since the 1930’s.
